It is more or less what you have selected there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") 

An object with children, for the KK object, you put the PartTools exporter on the root object, It looks like you're doing that already.

![67096f257e.png](http://puu.sh/psY5N/67096f257e.png)

Your problems are probably related to the Linux version of Unity, because I believe it is quite new? Sorry about that.

![21a5206b83.jpg](http://puu.sh/psY9f/21a5206b83.jpg)

Hey beale last time I'll bother you I promise.

Could I perhaps have the obj files for the current launch site as well? The download link is broken.

Earlier you mentioned thinking about adding the N-1 launchpad, which is a great idea, but that just wouldn't work in this location if it only permits highly inclined or polar orbits... actually, as I'm typing this, I'm developing a question related to this: is 51.5 degrees an accessible orbit from here? That's the flight path of the real N-1.
